['Abbreviated Title: Ph II SGI110 in Peds & Adults', '91', 'Version Date: 07/22/2019', 'DISTRESS RATING TOOL', 'Caregiver', 'NAME:', 'RELATIONSHIP TO CHILD:', 'DATE:', 'INSTRUCTIONS: We know that people with a medical illness can get sad and stressed out from', 'time to time. Sometimes people can get overwhelmed and distressed by managing all the aspects of', 'their own life along with their illness. When we say distress, we are referring to a range of feelings', 'that can include sadness, being anxious, fearful, worried, or upset. These feelings may affect how you', 'feel physically and emotionally.', 'On the thermometer below, circle the number that best describes how much distress YOUR child', 'has been feeling IN THE PAST MONTH with a "0" indicating no distress at all and a "10"', 'indicating the most distress he/she could possibly feel. Then, after indicating the level of distress', "on the thermometer, please check the causes of YOUR CHILD'S distress.", 'Practical', 'Emotional', 'Has your child been stressed about:', 'Has your child been feeling:', 'Not understanding what is', 'Worried/Anxious', 'happening to his/her body', 'Sad/Depressed', 'School work, work', 'Lonely/Feeling Alone', 'Taking a lot of medications', 'Hiah Distress', '10', 'Guilt/self-doubt', 'Medical needs', 'Bored', 'Doctor/hospital visits', '9', 'Irritable', 'Future plans job/career', '8', 'Afraid to be alone', 'Not having good friends', 'Hopeless', 'Other Problems:', '7', 'Difficulty making decisions', '6', 'Worthless', 'Moderate Distress', 'Unhappy with how his/her', '5', 'body looks (What part', ')', '4', 'Having trouble concentrating', '3', 'Having racing thoughts', 'Spiritual', 'Scared (of', ')', 'Has your child been stressed about:', '2', 'Angry', 'Spiritual Questions', 'Other Problems:', '1', 'Difficulties Praying', 'Feeling Distanced from God', 'No Distress', 'o', 'Loss of Faith', 'Other Problems:', 'Physical', 'Has your child had problems with:', 'Pain', 'Getting around', 'Fatigue/lack of energy', 'Family/Social', 'Too much energy', 'Has your child been stressed about:', 'Sleeping through the night', 'Getting along with family', 'Weight(too high/toc low)', 'Not having support', 'Eating too much, too little', 'Getting along with friends', 'Headaches', 'Lack of communication', 'Trouble with his/her vision', 'w/friends/family', 'Stomach aches/pain', "Parent's stress", 'Diarrhea/constipation (bowels)', 'Sibling(s) stress', 'Not able/willing to exercise', 'Parent(s) being overprotective', 'Other Problems:', 'Other Problems:']['Abbreviated Title: Ph II SGI110 in Peds & Adults', '92', 'Version Date: 07/22/2019', '17 REFERENCES', '1.', 'Boikos SA, Pappo AS, Killian JK, et al.
